prompt: This is a test! give me 1 draft

videos.title: Tumbly Tumbler Lineup: Pick Your Wobble
videos.video_strategy: 5 fast TT print timelapses + final handheld glam still to maximize watch-through and comments; prompt viewers to vote 1–5.
videos.video_caption:
Tumbly Tumbler lineup: five prints that refuse to sit flat—by design. They wiggle, they wobble, they do not spill (unless you do). Pick your fighter 1–5.
#TumblyTumbler #3DPrintedCeramics #PotteryReel #ClayTimelapse #Autopotter #DesignByVibration

elements.text: Pick your wobble—these tumblers are chaotic good and drink perfectly.
